title: Citibank Taiwan Forges New Partnerships to Expand Offshore Wealth Management Products and Services
summary: On the back of further de-regulation of the offshore banking business in Taiwan, Citibank Taiwan has forged partnerships with top financial institutions to expand the bank's offshore wealth management products and services, catering to growing demand from clients.
tag-1: Citibank Taiwan Forges New Partnerships to Expand Offshore Wealth Management Products and Services
tag-3: On the back of further de-regulation of the offshore banking business in Taiwan, Citibank Taiwan has forged partnerships with top financial institutions to expand the bank's offshore wealth management products and services, catering to growing demand from clients.
tag-4: Citibank Taiwan yesterday announced that it has partnered with China Asset Management (Hong Kong), Allianz Global Investors Taiwan and Value Partners to introduce three types of investment products:
tag-5: Commenting on the expansion of the bank's offshore wealth management products and services, Citibank Taiwan Consumer Banking Head Yunny Lee said, "As the pioneer and market leader of wealth management in Taiwan, we continue to monitor and cater to the local wealth management market actively. The introduction of these new products further affirms our lead in the market and our ongoing commitment to catering to our customers' specific needs and wants."
tag-6: The bank's latest efforts are reflective of a survey conducted by Citibank Taiwan to ascertain what offshore banking customers are looking out for. In terms of investment tools and services, 20 percent of respondents indicated their preference for renminbi-denominated products while 16 percent wanted access to offshore funds. High-yield bonds and hedge funds were sought after by 13 percent of respondents while 9 percent indicated their inclination towards structured notes and private equity funds.
tag-7: "We study our customers well, and we are continuously looking to innovate and make breakthroughs so that we are a full-range provider of wealth management products and services. With the government's deregulation of the financial sector, Citibank Taiwan will continue to develop a greater variety of products to help strengthen and grow the local wealth management industry," Lee added.
tag-8: Chairman of Citibank Taiwan Victor Kuan added, "This year, 2014, is a very meaningful one for us. In addition to the continued deregulation of the offshore banking industry, 2014 also marks Citibank Taiwan's 50th year in the country. For the past five decades, we, along with our customers, have witnessed many important economic milestones in the development of the financial industry in Taiwan, and we look forward to many more."
tag-9: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
